entry.title: JKM Boston Strong Ribbon with Brass Pin
entry.summary:
Vendor: JKM
Type: Ribbon
Price: 1.00

The Boston Strong Ribbon is an awareness ribbon with a brass pin which JKM is selling to support the victims of the Boston Marathon Bombing. JKM is donating a portion of the profits to the One Fund Boston Foundation (onefundboston.org). Specifically, We have a blue ribbon with yellow print and a yellow ribbon with blue print as shown above. Please note: we do not place the pin on the ribbon and you will have to attach it in order to make the pins shown above. The product comes with 1 ribbon and 1 brass pin per box.
In effort to raise money and start a charitable fundraising project, JKM will be adding to this section more awareness ribbons for all of the major upcoming marathons. For example, we will be adding a Philly Strong Ribbon to the site for the upcoming Philadelphia Half Marathon to raise awareness and remember the victims from the Boston Marathon who were affected by the act of terror. A portion of the proceeds from any sale related to these particular awareness ribbons will be donated to the One Fund Boston Foundation (onefundboston.org). If you have a design you want to create along these lines, please email us at customerservice@jkmribbon.com.
(Product Characteristic: Awareness Ribbon) / (Fabric Content: 100% Polyester)

entry.title: JKM Philadelphia Strong Ribbon with Brass Pin
entry.summary:
Vendor: JKM
Type: Ribbon
Price: 1.00

The Philadephia Strong Ribbon is an awareness ribbon with a brass pin which JKM is selling to support the victims of the Boston Marathon Bombing. JKM is donating a portion of the profits to the One Fund Boston Foundation (onefundboston.org). Specifically, We have a variety of ribbon color and print color combinations as shown above. Please note: we do not place the pin on the ribbon and you will have to attach it in order to make the pins shown above. The product comes with 1 ribbon and 1 brass pin per box.
In effort to raise money and start a charitable fundraising project, JKM intends to add more ribbon/pins like this Philadelphia pin to remember and support the victims of the Boston Marathon. Our goal is to add all of the marathons to our site with the colors and phrase respective of each city and marathon. Overall, let's join as one to display our unity and resolve to overcome any terror acts. A portion of the proceeds from any sale related to these particular awareness ribbons will be donated to the One Fund Boston Foundation (onefundboston.org). If you have a design you want to create along these lines, please email us at customerservice@jkmribbon.com.
(Product Characteristic: Awareness Ribbon) / (Fabric Content: 100% Polyester)

entry.title: JKM Orange Awareness Ribbon - Ribbons for Rescue
entry.summary:
Vendor: JKM
Type: Ribbon
Price: 1.00

Orange Ribbon is an awareness ribbon with a brass pin which we are selling to raise attention to the victims of terrorism. The lapel pin features 3/8" double-faced ribbon with white print. The product comes with 1 ribbon and 1 brass pin per box. It measures approximately: 2-3/4" High x 1-3/4" Wide using 3/8" wide ribbon. Please note you will have to attach the pin to the ribbon. If you have a different message you would like on this type ribbon, please email us at customerservice@jkmribbon.com.
(Product Characteristic: Awareness Ribbon) / (Fabric Content: 100% Polyester)

entry.title: JKM Rainbow Ribbon Lapel Pin
entry.summary:
Vendor: JKM
Type: Ribbon
Price: 0.65

The Rainbow Ribbon Lapel Pin is an awareness ribbon with a brass pin which JKM is selling to support June Awareness for the GLBT or LGBT community. This style of ribbon is symbol of gay pride and JKM is donating a portion of the profits to the AIDS Research Alliance (www.aidsresearch.org). Please note: we do not place the pin on the ribbon and you will have to attach it in order to make the pins shown above. The product comes with 1 ribbon and 1 brass pin per box.
In effort to raise money and start a charitable fundraising project, JKM intends to add more awareness ribbon/pins like this to remember and raise awareness respective of the groups being honored that month. For example, our goal is to add all of the marathons to our site with the colors and phrase respective of each city and marathon creating an awareness ribbon pin to support victims of the Boston Marathon. Overall, let's join as one to display our unity and resolve to overcome any terror acts along with showing our support with charitable donations to the awareness groups each month. A portion of the proceeds from any sale related to these particular awareness ribbons will be donated to the charity associated with the awareness group. If you have a design you want to create along these lines, please email us at customerservice@jkmribbon.com.
(Product Characteristic: Awareness Ribbon) / (Fabric Content: 100% Polyester)
